value:
Fire Emblem Heroes is linked
to a Nintendo Account.

If you delete your data, all save
data for Fire Emblem Heroes,
including any Orbs you may have,
will be permanently erased.

This also means that the Fire
Emblem Heroes save data linked
to your Nintendo Account will be
deleted. You will no longer be able
to access this data on any device.

All save data for this app, including
app play records, purchase history
and all items (Orbs, characters, flags,
hero feathers etc.) will be lost.
Are you sure you want to proceed?

You will not be able to recover your
data. This includes any Orbs you
have purchased and any other items
you have. Please note that once
your data has been deleted, it cannot
be recovered. No refunds will be
given for Orbs. Are you certain
you wish to delete your data?

All data has been deleted. Please
close the app. If you want to
start over and use the app again,
you must reinstall the app.

To confirm your decision, please
enter your year of birth. This info
should match that stored in your
Nintendo Account.

The year of birth you entered
does not match the year of birth
stored in your Nintendo Account.
